title: How do you do the Vision Ping thingy?
body: No idea how to. plox halp{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
You can set up those keybinds under the client settings -> Hotkeys. If they don't seem to be saving correctly try doing a config reset to get them refreshed.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
You go to hotkeys -> communication the set a hotkey for it
